member.name: T:ShiftIt.Ftp.DirectoryListMode
member.summary: List of common directory listing modes for FTP

member.name: F:ShiftIt.Ftp.DirectoryListMode.NameList
member.summary: Standardised list mode. Returns only file/directory names

member.name: F:ShiftIt.Ftp.DirectoryListMode.PlatformList
member.summary: Platform specific list mode. Returns more details than NameList, but output varies from server to server.

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Ftp.FtpSession
member.summary: A class to send and receive files over FTP, using sockets connections instead of the .Net built in methods.

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession
member.summary: Contract for an Ftp session

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.ToString
member.summary: Return a rough URI representation of this factory's connection settings

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.SetRemoteHost(System.String)
member.summary: Set the name or IP addres of the FTP server to connect to.
member.param: Server name

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.GetRemoteHost
member.summary: Return the name of the current FTP server.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.SetRemotePort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the port number to use for FTP.
member.param: Port number

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.GetRemotePort
member.summary: Return the current port number.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.SetRemotePath(System.String)
member.summary: Set the remote directory path.
member.param: The remote directory path

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.GetRemotePath
member.summary: Return the current remote directory path.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.SetRemoteUser(System.String)
member.summary: Set the user name to use for logging into the remote server.
member.param: Username

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.SetRemotePass(System.String)
member.summary: Set the password to user for logging into the remote server.
member.param: Password

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.GetFileList(System.String)
member.summary: Return a string array containing the remote directory's file list.
member.param: Filename mask to apply to list. This is server dependent, but filters like *.txt, *.exe usually work.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.GetFileSize(System.String)
member.summary: Return the size of a file.
member.param: Full name of a file in the current directory

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Login
member.summary: Login to the remote server. If needed, username and password should have been given before calling.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.SetBinaryMode(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set the data transfer mode between binary and text.
member.param: If true, set binary mode for downloads (8 bit); Else set ASCII text mode (7 bit).

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Download(System.String)
member.summary: Download a file to the Assembly's local directory, keeping the same file name. Always resets file's download progress.
member.param: Name of file on remote server

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Download(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Download a remote file to the Assembly's local directory, keeping the same file name, and set the resume flag.
member.param: Name of file on remote server
if true, try to continue a previous download

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Download(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Download a remote file to a local file name which can include a path. The local file name will be created or overwritten, but the path must exist.
member.param: Local file name (may be a full path)
Remote file name

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Download(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Download a remote file to a local file name which can include a path, and set the resume flag. The local file name will be created or overwritten, but the path must exist.
member.param: Local file name (may be a full path)
Remote file name
if true, try to continue a previous download

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Upload(System.String)
member.summary: Upload a file to the current remote directory.
member.param: Full local path and filename to upload

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Upload(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Upload a file to the current remote directory.
member.param: Full local path and filename to upload
Resume partial upload if possible

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Upload(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Upload a file and set the resume flag.
member.param: Full local path and filename to upload
file name as it should be on the remote server
if true, try to continue a previous upload

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.DeleteRemoteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a file from the remote FTP server.
member.param: File in the current remote directory

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.RenameRemoteFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Rename a file on the remote FTP server.
member.param: File name in the current remote directory
New file name

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Mkdir(System.String)
member.summary: Create a directory on the remote FTP server as a child of the current working directory
member.param: New directory name

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Pwd
member.summary: List the current working directory
member.returns: Current working directory, result of PWD command

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Rmdir(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a directory on the remote FTP server.
member.param: Old directory name

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Chdir(System.String)
member.summary: Change the current working directory on the remote FTP server.
member.param: New directory

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Close
member.summary: Close the FTP connection.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.EnsureRemotePath(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Check that the specified path exists. If it doesn't, then it is created (if possible).
member.remarks: Unless this method throws an exception, it should return in the same working directory as when it is called. If remote path is set to ".", the method will exit in the deepest folder created by this method.
member.param: Path to ensure
If true, path is treated as relative to the working directory. Otherwise, it is assumed to be an absolute path on the server.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.Abort
member.summary: Cancel data transfer in progress

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.SetDebug(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Set debug mode. This causes diagnostic information to be printed to the console.

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.ShouldOverwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets whether existing remote files are deleted prior to uploads. This does not affect downloads.

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.ShouldContinue
member.summary: Gets or sets whether ftp file transfers will be continued from partial uploads. Use with caution.

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.PassiveMode
member.summary: Gets or sets whether ftp connections are active or passive

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Ftp.IFtpSession.ListMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the command mode used to return directory listings

member.summary: Create a new FTP transfer agent.

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Http.HttpClient
member.summary: Standard Http client for Shift-it

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpClient
member.summary: Contract for HttpClient.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpClient.Request(ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequest)
member.summary: Issue a request to a server, and return the (IDisposable) response.
member.exception: Timeouts while reading or writing sockets

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpClient.CrossLoad(ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequest,ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder)
member.summary: Request data from one resource and provide to another. This is done in a memory-efficient manner.
member.param: Request that will provide body data (should be a GET or POST)
Request that will accept body data (should be a PUT or POST)

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpClient.CrossLoad(ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequest,ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder,System.String)
member.summary: Request data from one resource and provide to another, calculating a hash of the cross-loaded data. This is done in a memory-efficient manner.
member.param: Request that will provide body data (should be a GET or POST)
Request that will accept body data (should be a PUT or POST)
Name of hash algorithm to use (should a name supported by System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm)

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpClient.Timeout
member.summary: Connection and data transfer timeout

member.name: F:ShiftIt.Http.HttpClient.DefaultTimeout
member.summary: Default conenction and data timeout (5 seconds)

member.summary: Create a new HttpClient with a specified connection and parser

member.summary: Start a new HttpClient

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.HttpClient.Request(ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequest)
member.summary: Issue a request to a server, and return the (IDisposable) response.
member.exception: Timeouts while reading or writing sockets

member.summary: Request data from one resource and provide to another. This is done in a memory-efficient manner.
member.param: Request that will provide body data (should be a GET or POST)
Request that will accept body data (should be a PUT or POST)

member.summary: Request data from one resource and provide to another, calculating a hash of the cross-loaded data. This is done in a memory-efficient manner.

member.summary: HTTP requests builder and request object

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder
member.summary: Helper for building HTTP requests

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.Get(System.Uri)
member.summary: Request a target resource

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.Head(System.Uri)
member.summary: Request the headers of a resource, excluding the resource itself.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.Post(System.Uri)
member.summary: Post data to a target resource. You should use the `Data` or `StringData` methods to provide this data.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.Put(System.Uri)
member.summary: Put data to a target resource. You should use the `Data` or `StringData` methods to provide this data.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.Delete(System.Uri)
member.summary: Request that a resource be deleted.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.Verb(System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Make a custom request
member.param: Verb of request
Target resource

member.summary: Set the value of a header field, replacing any existing values

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.AddHeader(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a value to a header field, supplimenting any existing values

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.Accept(System.String)
member.summary: Set the MIME types to accept for the resource. Defaults to */* if not provided.

member.summary: Provide a data stream for the request. It will be sent to the target resource's hosting server.

Length of data. Must be provided.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Http.IHttpRequestBuilder.StringData(System.String)
member.summary: Provide string data for the request. It will be sent to the target resource's hosting server.

member.summary: Provide basic authentication details for the target resource. WARNING: this will be sent in the clear. Use only in internal networks or over SSL connections.

member.summary: Invalid response

member.summary: Informational (1xx)

member.summary: Success (2xx)

member.summary: Redirection (3xx)

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.HttpChunkedResponseStream
member.summary: Wrapper around a chunked http body stream

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream
member.summary: Wrapper around a HTTP response body. All decompression and decoding is handled.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.ReadStringToLength
member.summary: Read string up to the declared response length. If response is chunked, this will read until an empty chunk is received.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.ReadStringToTimeout
member.summary: Read string while data is on the stream, waiting up to the timeout value for more data. If response is chunked, this will read the next chunk.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.ReadBytesToLength
member.summary: Read raw bytes up to the declared response length. If response is chunked, this will read until an empty chunk is received.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.ReadBytesToTimeout
member.summary: Read raw bytes while data is on the stream, waiting up to the timeout value for more data.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read raw bytes from the response into a buffer, returning number of bytes read.

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.ExpectedLength
member.summary:
Length that server reported for the response. Tries to give decompressed length if response is compressed.
Due to frequent protocol violations, this is not 100% reliable.

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.Complete
member.summary:
Returns true if all expected data has been read. Returns false if message should have more data.
Due to frequent protocol violations, this is not 100% reliable.

member.name: P:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.IHttpResponseStream.Timeout
member.summary: Timeout for reading.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.HttpChunkedResponseStream.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Wrap a chunked http response

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.HttpChunkedResponseStream.Finalize
member.summary: Dispose of the underlying stream

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.HttpChunkedResponseStream.ReadStringToLength
member.summary: Read string up to the declared response length. If response is chunked, this will read until an empty chunk is received.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.HttpChunkedResponseStream.ReadStringToTimeout
member.summary: Read string while data is on the stream, waiting up to the timeout value for more data. If response is chunked, this will read the next chunk.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.HttpChunkedResponseStream.ReadChunkLength(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read chunk length. Throws if chunk length not available. Should leave a spare '\n' char on stream if protocol correct.

member.summary: Read raw bytes up to the declared response length. If response is chunked, this will read until an empty chunk is received.

member.summary: Read raw bytes while data is on the stream, waiting up to the timeout value for more data.

member.name: T:ShiftIt.Internal.Streaming.HashingReadStream
member.summary: Wraps a stream in a hash algorithm

member.summary: Create a new hashing readstream

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Streaming.HashingReadStream.GetHashValue
member.summary: Call after stream is complete to get hash value

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Streaming.HashingReadStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.exception: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.
The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Streaming.HashingReadStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the underlying stream and optionally releases the managed resources.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Streaming.HashingReadStream.Flush
member.summary: Not Supported

member.summary: Not Supported

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Streaming.HashingReadStream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: Not Supported

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Streaming.HashingReadStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Not Supported

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
member.returns: true if the stream supports reading; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Not Supported

member.summary: Not Supported

member.summary: Does nothing

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.SocketStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads from the underlying socket into a provided buffer.
member.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
member.param: An array of bytes. When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between and ( + - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
member.exception: The sum of and is larger than the buffer length.
The stream does not support reading.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: M:ShiftIt.Internal.Socket.SocketStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a sequence of bytes to the underlying socket.
member.param: An array of bytes. This method copies bytes from to the current stream.
The zero-based byte offset in at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.
